name: Clash of Steel 2: The Future Edition or What Is After World War III?
name_original: Clash of Steel 2: The Future Edition or What Is After World War III?
description:
Clash of Steel 2: The Future Edition or What Is After World War III? is a strategy game developed by Strategic Simulations. It was originally released in 1995. It was published by Strategic Simulations.
You can play Clash of Steel 2: The Future Edition or What Is After World War III? on PC.
